title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Chris Spielman
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Chris Spielman
description:
Chris Spielman joins the final hour to talk the negative effect missing a full season could do to potential NFL prospects. Also College players may be being a bit more responsible dealing with Covid-19 due to the pressure of letting their respective teams down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
